entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon with 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 25. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Wednesday 04 May 2016
